desc: The products at PRL Farm are made using all natural ingredients from the farm or local area. Our products are made in small batches and are available online or at our rustic farm-themed market and some local retail stores. We practice pollinator guardianship and sustainably harvest from our fields.

layout.text:
A small, sustainable, family run lavender farm in northern Harford County, Maryland.
Flowers, herbs, alpacas, horses, and our lavender labs, are lovin' and livin' on lavender time
Hope to see you when the fields bloom purple... come experience the lavender life
